## ControlHook interface

Represents a object for hooking onto a controls value changes.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ControlHook<TResponse> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [callback](./dynamic-forms.controlhook.callback.md) | (val: unknown) =&gt; TResponse | The function being called when the control(s) value changes. |
|  [controlName](./dynamic-forms.controlhook.controlname.md) | string \| string\[\] | The name of the control(s) |
